casebody.data:
TILLMAN
v.
COMMERCIAL CREDIT. No. 360A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 18, 2006. John Alan Jones, G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Tillman and Richardson. Jeffrey M. Young, Research Triangle Park, Christopher J. Willis, Richard H. Sinkfield, Atlanta, GA, for Commercial Credit, et al. Mallam J. Maynard, F. Paul Bland, Jr., Washington, DC, for NC Justice Center, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of September 2006 by NC Justice Center, et al for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of September 2006."
